name: Starting an Open Source Project
description: Launching a successful open source project involves more than just code. Start your journey here.
author: GitHub
inLanguage: English, Chinese (Traditional)/繁體中文, Chinese (Simplified) / 简体中文, French/Français, Turkish/Türkçe, Persian/Farsi, Tamil/தமிழ், Spanish/Español, Swahili, Hindi, Russian/Русский, Hungarian/Magyar, Romanian, Bengali/Bangla, Portuguese, Bulgarian/Български, Polish, Nigerian Pidgin, German/Deutsch, Dutch, Greek/Ελληνικά, Malay, Japanese/日本語, Korean/한국어, Italian, Indonesian
dependsOn: 13 - Introduction to Git | 33 - Understanding Software Licensing
abstract: Learn the foundational steps for launching a successful open source project, from defining its purpose and choosing a license to setting up version control and creating a contributor-friendly environment.
mentions: These guides are available in over 20 languages.
